BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.cachorro
(
    id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    sobre character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    id_raca bigint,
    CONSTRAINT cachorro_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.raca
(
    id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    apresentacao character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    sobre character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT racas_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.cachorro
    ADD CONSTRAINT cachorro_raca FOREIGN KEY (id_raca)
    REFERENCES public.raca (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
